title: AED Game Character Voice -  Wraith
description: Step into the chilling embrace of The Wraith, a haunting embodiment of the ethereal, sure to send shivers down your spine and a shudder through your soul!
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - Wraith voice-over sound library provides you with more than 275+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences.Â 


The Wraith's voice profile is ethereal, ghostly and raspy. He is perfect for wraiths, ghosts, spirits or creepy in-game non-player characters or any antagonist game characters with elements of evil or haunted tendencies. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocals effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Male, Raspy, Ethereal, Ghostly, Breathy

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's, MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

162 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 289


Number of Audio Cues: 289


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
